tatami.pc.util.windowLayout

Class WindowLayout.Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.pc.util.windowLayout.WindowLayout.Grid
  • Enclosing class:
    WindowLayout

    protected class WindowLayout.Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal class that manages the current allocation, by means of an array of cells, each cell having a pointer to the WindowParameters of the window that resides in the space this cell is part of.
    Author:
    Andrei Olaru
